title: Newtons first law - balanced and unbalanced force

content.description: The figures show the forces exerted on an object moving on a horizontal surface at two different moments in time. Which of the following correctly compares the change in direction, if any, of the velocity of the object in the two figures?
content.question: Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>Figure <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>ANot changingNot changingBNot changingChanging in the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-directionCChanging in the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>y</mi></math>-directionNot changingDChanging in the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>y</mi></math>-directionChanging in the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-direction

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
